title: The Climate Message Needs to Change: Here’s How – Part 2
content:
This group brings together the best thinkers on energy and climate. Join us for smart, insightful posts and conversations about where the energy industry is and where it is going.

Two recent surveys on attitudes toward energy and climate change made it clear that the climate change message isn’t getting through. A new communications strategy is needed.
Yesterday I offered five recommendations on how it should change. Today I offer another five. We ended yesterday’s post by recommending that climate scientists should stop making predictions. With start today off by completing my thoughts on how the scientific message should shift.
Tomorrow, we’ll wrap up the topic with a more detailed analysis of how to target the different generations.
My thoughts are a work in process. I don’t pretend to have all the answers so I welcome a dialogue.
